string.value: It seems that something related to the Black Wings is happening in #b#m200000000##k. You should talk to #b#p2012012##k.

#p2012012# the fairy has noticed that the number of #r#o9300347#s#k has been steadily increasing in #b#m200060001##k and wants you to look into the #o9300347#s there. Apparently, if you're not careful and enter the wrong path from #b#m200060000##k, you may end up in #m200060001# instead, so you should head there right now, eliminate the #o9300347#s, and retrieve any strange items they might drop.\r\n\r\n#i4032324# #t4032324# #b#c4032324# / 5#k

After defeating the #o9300347#s, you brought back a #t4032324#. #p2012012# was curious to see who would do such a thing and seemed to worry even more that the sheer weight of the Nependeaths might cause Orbis to sink. She wanted you to discuss the problem about #m200000000# with someone who might know more.

Ahhh…my head hurts. There's nothing worse for fairies than fatigue from lack of sleep. What can I do for you? Seeing how you've talked to more than once, it must be something very important...\n#b#L0#You explain that you heard there's something strange going on in #m200000000#...#l\n#k

Oh, how did you know? I mean, lately, we've been hearing a loud, thumping noise every other second all throughout #m200000000#. It's so loud that none of the fairies can get any sleep. \n#b#L0#(Is there a way to find out what's going on here?)#l\n#k

Of course I wanted to get to the bottom of this myself, so I tried looking into it… But I don't think it's something I can do on my own. If you don't mind, can you help us with this? I'll reward you for your work.\n

I followed the thumping noise and it led me to #b#m200060001##k, a remote place that even residents of #m200000000# never visit. Then, I saw. It was a #rgiant Nependeath#k! One that's a few times bigger than regular Nependeaths.

How in the world did a Nependeath like that come about? I have no idea. Nependeaths in #m200000000# are not the type that grow like this one. We'll need to look for the cause behind this. Can you eliminate #r#o9300347#s#k and find out the #bcause#k of all of this?

#m200060001#, where #o9300347#s are found, can be accessed through #b#m200060000##k. You must go through an obscure road to get there. Head over to #m200060001#, defeat #o9300347#, and if you happen to find an item that you think could have triggered this, then please bring it to me.
If you can't help us, then there's nothing we can do about it. Seriously, how can a giant, giant Nependeath like that even exist?
Did you manage to eliminate the #o9300347#s? Did you find any items that could have caused them to grow so big?
#t4032324#? Who gave this to Nependeath? No wonder the Nependeath grew out of control. Wait, that's not the problem!
I don't know if you know this, but #m200000000# is a town that floats in the air. However, it has started to sink gradually over the years. If #m200000000# gets heavier, it can sink to the ground.
I need to find out if #m200000000# will sink to the ground. I'm sure #b#p2032001##k in #b#m200050000##k would know the answer. Please go talk to #p2032001#.

Haven't you defeated the #r#o9300347#s#k yet? Go to #b#m200060000##k and take the less visible path, and you'll soon find yourself in #b#m200060001##k. There, you must defeat #o9300347#s and look for the reason that has caused this monster to grow unlike anything else.

Haven't you defeated the #r#o9300347#s#k yet? Go to #b#m200060000##k and take the less visible path, and you'll soon find yourself in #b#m200060001##k. There, you must defeat #o9300347#s and look for the reason that has caused this monster to grow unlike anything else.
